mapper.select: SELECT A.article_no , A.image_url , A.title , A.content , A.writer_no , M.mbr_id , A.view_cnt , A.like_cnt , A.delete_yn , A.reg_date , A.update_date FROM ARTICLE A LEFT JOIN tb_member M ON A.writer_no = M.mbr_no WHERE A.delete_yn = 'N'

SELECT A.article_no , A.image_url , A.title , A.content , A.writer_no , M.mbr_id , A.view_cnt , A.like_cnt , A.delete_yn , A.reg_date , A.update_date FROM ARTICLE A LEFT JOIN tb_member M ON A.writer_no = M.mbr_no WHERE A.delete_yn = 'N' and `article_no` = #{articleNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ARTICLE SET like_cnt = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ARTICLE_LIKE WHERE article_no = #{articleNo}) WHERE article_no = #{articleNo}
